mapper.update:
update tb_funds_details
fd_login_id = #{fdLoginId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fd_third_account = #{fdThirdAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fd_serial_number = #{fdSerialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fd_serial_type_id = #{fdSerialTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fd_serial_type_name = #{fdSerialTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fd_serial_amount = #{fdSerialAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fd_balance_before = #{fdBalanceBefore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fd_balance_after = #{fdBalanceAfter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fd_commission_charge = #{fdCommissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fd_bp_id = #{fdBpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fd_bp_name = #{fdBpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fd_create_time = #{fdCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fd_serial_time = #{fdSerialTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fd_balance_status = #{fdBalanceStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fd_serial_status = #{fdSerialStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fd_is_del = #{fdIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where fd_id = #{fdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_funds_details set fd_login_id = #{fdLoginId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fd_third_account = #{fdThirdAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fd_serial_number = #{fdSerialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fd_serial_type_id = #{fdSerialTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fd_serial_type_name = #{fdSerialTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fd_serial_amount = #{fdSerialAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fd_balance_before = #{fdBalanceBefore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fd_balance_after = #{fdBalanceAfter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fd_commission_charge = #{fdCommissionCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fd_bp_id = #{fdBpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fd_bp_name = #{fdBpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fd_create_time = #{fdCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fd_serial_time = #{fdSerialTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fd_balance_status = #{fdBalanceStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fd_serial_status = #{fdSerialStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fd_is_del = #{fdIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fd_id = #{fdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) as total_trades,SUM(fd_serial_amount) as total_amounts,fd_serial_type_id as serial_type_id from tb_funds_details where fd_serial_status=1 AND fd_login_id=#{fdLoginId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY fd_serial_type_id

select
from tb_funds_details order by fd_id DESC LIMIT #{pageWhere.begin},#{pageWhere.pageSize}

select
from tb_funds_details WHERE
order by fd_id DESC
LIMIT #{pageWhere.begin},#{pageWhere.pageSize}
